Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: Create gerrit comment trigger to trigger specific cron jobs
Issue.description: Create gerrit trigger comments to retrigger daily jobs like fabric-smoke-test, fabric test-daily that would enable someone to retrigger cron jobs when a patch for the cron job is merged, by selecting the "Reply" on Gerrit and submit the respective trigger comment. This will help the patch submitter to retrigger the cron job after merge in hyperledger, not having to wait for the job to trigger till the time specified in the cron job. The trigger comment can also be helpful to retrigger the cron job when it fails becaulse on a network issue or a timeout error.
